definition: therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)

sentences.english: So it's a kind of machine which take advantage of fatigue-fracture.
sentences.chinese: 因而，它是一种化害为利，利用疲劳断裂下料的机械。

sentences.english: Linda phoned me in on arrival so that I know she was safe and sound.
sentences.chinese: 琳达到达后给我打了电话，因而我知道她平安无事。

sentences.english: We think it’s possible that your company is at risk in this area as well.
sentences.chinese: 因而我们认为贵司在这个领域也可能面临同样的风险。

sentences.english: The rain fell in torrents, insomuch that the soldiers were often ankle-deep in water.
sentences.chinese: 大雨倾盆，因而士兵们时时需涉水而行。

sentences.english: Thus in this period, the subject concerning two-party system and party competes becomes hot point.
sentences.chinese: 因而这一时期有关两党制和党争的话题成为言论热点。

sentences.english: So he can't know, yet, that death doesn't really mean anything in comics.
sentences.chinese: 因而至今他也不知道死亡在漫画中没什么实际意义。

sentences.english: Therefore silk is known as "second-skin body" of reputation.
sentences.chinese: 因而蚕丝素有“人体第二肌肤”之美誉。

sentences.english: Some of your people will also need to bedismissed because of excessive absenteeism.
sentences.chinese: 你的某些员工，经常旷工，因而也需要被开除。

sentences.english: The reaction is intramolecular and hence fast and clean.
sentences.chinese: 此反应属分子内反应，因而快速且干净利索。

sentences.english: Therefore, he facilitates IBM and the software company positively achieves a series of agreements.
sentences.chinese: 因而，他积极促成IBM与软件公司告竣一系列协议。

sentences.english: Consquently, the present invention has a more practical value compared with the existing life testing method.
sentences.chinese: 因而它和现有寿命试验相比有更加实用的价值。

sentences.english: In order to attain the certain lump coal rate, the key is reasonable picks-lacing.
sentences.chinese: 因而要达到一定的块煤率，关键是截齿的合理排列。

sentences.english: However, the assignor may be liable to the obligor for breach of contract.
sentences.chinese: 但是，让与人可能因而向债务人承担违约义务。
那件讼案因而尚未解决。

sentences.english: As shallow-water plants, phytoplankton are therefore starving to death, according to the findings.
sentences.chinese: 根据该研究，浮游植物为浅水植物，因而饿死。

sentences.english: Ben had it out with his roommate about coming back home so late and making a lot of noise.
sentences.chinese: 是有深夜迟归引起一连串噪音，班因而与他起了口角。

definition: due to/as a result of/thanks to/owing to/since/because
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to such an extent as to/down to/up to
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger
and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)
